Articles.Content:
What's the differences between ECLSS and TLS?

ECLSS: Oxygen -> CO2 (and a recycler that gives you 95% back I think)

TACLS: Oxygen -> CO2; Food -> Waste; Water -> WasteWater; and some more complicated stuff

Summary:

ECLSS: Easy

TACLS: Harder, more realistic, and more supported by other mods (for some reason, don't know why honestly) like MKS/OKS, US, and others (many more that I'm not listing)
is Eclss still being maintained?
Yes it is, working hard on version 2
DO NOT EVA KERBALS AND RETURN TO SPACE CENTER, ALWAYS END EVA BEFOR! Working on a fix.

Yes it is, working hard on version 2

cool can't wait to see it guess i am one of the very few that prefers eclss over tac

cool can't wait to see it guess i am one of the very few that prefers eclss over tac

As long as just one is using ECLSS i'll continue the development

As long as just one is using ECLSS i'll continue the development

Would you be so kind as to elaborate, I need to get a bit more infomation if i stand a chance to fix it.

I'm sorry I took so long to check on the status of this again!

Basically, the original ECLSS release caused sub-windows in the game to not want to close/be unable to open (for example, inventory/storage windows).

It made it very difficult to use, naturally. I hope this problem has been fixed, I've been using the IFI Life Support in the meantime. Has anyone using the new release encountered this bug?

The greatest thing about ECLSS is the limited EVA propellant feature. That's a crucial feature for me that surprisingly I can't find in any other mod. I also had the the kraken hit when returning to Space Center while on EVA. I'm looking forward to a fix.
Good News, i believe i have solved the EVA Kraken. Time for some testing and if its all good, there should be a new release some time this evening.
good to hear
ECLSS Updated to 1.0.19 A.k.a Death to the Kraken
Much thanks for the update and is the LifeSupportRegeneratorModule always on ?

Much thanks for the update and is the LifeSupportRegeneratorModule always on ?

No, the module is attached to the regenerator, so if the ship uses the regenerator part, the RealTimeVesselHandlerFramework picks is up and does its stuff. But if on the other hand your ship does not use the part, the modules is simply skipped, and the RealTimeVesselHandlerFramework goes merrily on its way.

ECLSS Updated to 1.0.19 A.k.a Death to the Kraken

Yaaay btw should "Recue Kerbal" contract still be ignored?

Yaaay btw should "Recue Kerbal" contract still be ignored?

yes, for the time being.

No, the module is attached to the regenerator, so if the ship uses the regenerator part, the RealTimeVesselHandlerFramework picks is up and does its stuff. But if on the other hand your ship does not use the part, the modules is simply skipped, and the RealTimeVesselHandlerFramework goes merrily on its way.

Sorry so if, I get this right we can't add LifeSupportRegeneratorModule to all pods.

yes, for the time being.

oki dokie

Sorry so if, I get this right we can't add LifeSupportRegeneratorModule to all pods.

It's a standard PartModule, so you can if you so please. But why would you do that is i may ask?

It's a standard PartModule, so you can if you so please. But why would you do that is i may ask?

That way, I don't have to add the part but when, I add it to all pods there is no on or off.

EDIT- Plus it's alittle big for rovers and got this ramdom size bug Sometime the tanks are the same size as the co2 and this same for the Regenerator part this time it's smaller.

EDIT- It was doing that in the last release so it's not anything you done in this 1

Edited November 10, 2014 by Mecripp2

That way, I don't have to add the part but when, I add it to all pods there is no on or off.

Hmm strange, will have to look in to it.

Good to see an update, but how is ECLSS 2.0 going? I'd love to see it actually match TAC LS with regards to features.

Also, since there's already code to make IVA props react the the pluign, how about RPM integration? BobCat's dedicated prop doesn't seem to be getting much use.

Running this MM 

@PART[*]:HAS[@MODULE[ModuleCommand],#CrewCapacity[1]]:Final
{

        MODULE
	{
		name = LifeSupportRegeneratorModule

		INPUT_RESOURCE
		{
			name = ElectricCharge
			rate = 2.0
		}
		INPUT_RESOURCE
		{
			name = CarbonDioxide
			rate = 0.03
		}
		OUTPUT_RESOURCE
		{
			name = Oxygen
			rate = 0.027
		}
	}

	MODULE
	{
		name = TankPriorityModule
		Priority = 20
	}


	RESOURCE
	{
		name = Oxygen
		amount = 2280
		maxAmount = 2280
	}

	RESOURCE
	{
		name = CarbonDioxide
		amount = 0
		maxAmount = 1193
	}


}

Didn't get any toggle on but on the part
Shasol can you please confirm if you have 2 sets (duplicate) of buttons when right clicking on command pod, for Show Eclss gui and Eclss Settings?
